arts.ttl: Ranked – Top 3 Everton Goals V Spurs
arts.sum: Ahead of Everton’s Premier League game versus Spurs today, we look at three memorable goals against the London club. 3 – Michael Keane, Everton 1-1 Spurs. April 2023 A centre-half scoring a 25 yard worldie in the 90th minute to salvage a point. I vividly remember standing in the Lower Gwladys watching Keane line up to take this shot. I got half way through shouting, “Don’t f*****g shoot!” before Big Mick burst the net. Absolutely fair play. I’m always happy […] The post Ranked – Top 3 Everton Goals V Spurs appeared first on Grand Old Team.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Tottenham Hotspur – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton return to the Hill Dickinson Stadium on Sunday looking to get their season back on track against an injury-hit Tottenham Hotspur. After a bright start, David Moyes’ side have won just one of their last six league games. Therefore, this home fixture presents a crucial opportunity for three points. The Toffees will draw confidence […] The post Everton vs Tottenham Hotspur – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur XI vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur travel to Everton on Sunday, aiming to bounce back immediately from their first defeat in eight matches. A 2-1 home loss to Aston Villa last weekend ended Tottenham’s impressive unbeaten run. Consequently, manager Thomas Frank will surely demand a strong response from his players today.
